医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
常温局部灌注可以增加接受肺移植的患者数量在心脏不可逆转地停止跳动后，使用常温区域灌注（TA-NRP）技术对器官捐献者的肺部进行重新灌注可能会增加接受肺移植的患者数量，据美国心脏协会年会和科学会议的研究人员称，位于布拉格的国际心肺移植协会 (ISHLT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Normothermic-regional-perfusion-could-increase-the-number-of-病人-receiving-lung-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Normothermic-regional-perfusion-could-increase-the-number-of-病人-receiving-lung-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d07e83be-17cb-4a30-a35f-6142a053dcb2 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:05:00 -0400 Normothermic regional perfusion could increase the number of patients receiving lung transplants
KAIST 研究人员提出利用可持续原材料生产微生物食品由于人口快速增长和气候变化造成的粮食生产率下降，全球粮食危机正在加剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/KAIST-researchers-propose-microbial-food-product-from-sustainable-raw-materials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/KAIST-researchers-propose-microbial-food-product-from-sustainable-raw-materials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f3a03ca-7c8b-4982-a8fd-695b06424709 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:58:00 -0400 KAIST researchers propose microbial food production from sustainable raw materials
软肿瘤环境为癌细胞在转移过程中的生存做好了准备研究人员发现，肿瘤的机械特性如何使癌细胞在扩散到其他器官时更好地存活下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Soft-tumor-environments-prime-cancer-cells-for-survival-during-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Soft-tumor-environments-prime-cancer-cells-for-survival-during-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aea277a4-2a2f-4ecd-81d1-3d798fef79e8 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:51:00 -0400 Soft tumor environments prime cancer cells for survival during metastasis
研究发现精神病患者的关键大脑系统功能障碍在精神病患者的大脑内部，有两个关键系统出现故障：一个将注意力引向重要的外部事件和内部思想的“过滤器”，以及一个由预测奖励的路径组成的“预测器”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Study-finds-dysfunction-of-key-brain-systems-in-people-with-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Study-finds-dysfunction-of-key-brain-systems-in-people-with-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f62cde-4c0c-401e-9e5a-e57739e6def6 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:45:00 -0400 Study finds dysfunction of key brain systems in people with psychosis
Vosoritide 的第一个 2 期研究显示软骨发育不全儿童的生长加快根据国家儿童医院的研究人员的说法，Vosoritide 的第一项全球 2 期研究显示，患有软骨发育不全的儿童的生长速度平均每年增加 1.8 厘米，软骨发育不全是儿童身材矮小的遗传原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Vosoritides-first-phase-2-study-shows-increased-growth-in-children-with-hypochondroplasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Vosoritides-first-phase-2-study-shows-increased-growth-in-children-with-hypochondroplasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c0d40a9-e7e6-4f66-8583-dacc11767d04 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:38:00 -0400 Vosoritide's first phase 2 study shows increased growth in children with hypochondroplasia
通过行为干预应对公共卫生挑战“同一个健康”的概念强调人类、动物、植物和环境健康之间的关系，近年来在科学讨论中越来越受欢迎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Addressing-public-health-challenges-through-behavioral-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Addressing-public-health-challenges-through-behavioral-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b227070-6587-45e2-a5b4-c22bfaeea21f Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:30:00 -0400 Addressing public health challenges through behavioral interventions
研究表明，PET/MRI 组合可减少不必要的前列腺活检根据《核医学杂志》四月号上发表的新研究，PET/MRI 可以提高前列腺癌患者的诊断准确性，并有助于避免不必要的活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/PETMRI-combination-reduces-unnecessary-prostate-biopsies-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/PETMRI-combination-reduces-unnecessary-prostate-biopsies-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5b48ec9-e2ff-45ba-85b9-25c38d521fc3 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:22:00 -0400 PET/MRI combination reduces unnecessary prostate biopsies, study shows
研究发现，童年言语虐待每年给全球社会造成 3000 亿美元的损失由伦敦大学学院、Words Matter 和世界卫生组织 (WHO) 主办的首届儿童言语虐待国际会议上公布的调查结果显示，全球范围内，成年人对儿童的言语虐待每年给社会造成约 3000 亿美元（2390 亿英镑）的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Childhood-verbal-abuse-costs-global-society-24300-billion-annually-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Childhood-verbal-abuse-costs-global-society-24300-billion-annually-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30a926fd-e5bb-4d87-b0f2-295a0fc84a2a Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:14:00 -0400 Childhood verbal abuse costs global society $300 billion annually, study finds
可穿戴设备揭示睡眠期间与压力相关的变化如果可以使用可穿戴设备检测一个人睡眠时压力水平的变化会怎样？佛蒙特大学研究人员今天在《PLOS Digital Health》上发表的一项新研究首次发现了睡眠数据中反映的感知压力水平的变化——这是识别可能有助于标记需要支持的个人的生物标志物的重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Wearable-devices-reveal-stress-lated-changes-during-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Wearable-devices-reveal-stress-lated-changes-during-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaad3405-1818-408f-8298-c81d6997fc46 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 15:06:00 -0400 Wearable devices reveal stress-related changes during sleep
脊髓中的神经回路允许独立于大脑的运动学习日本理化学研究所脑科学中心 (CBS) 的 Aya Takeoka 及其同事发现了脊髓中的神经回路，可以实现不依赖于大脑的运动学习。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Neural- Circuitry-in-the-spinal-cord-allows-brain-independent-motor-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Neural- Circuitry-in-the-spinal-cord-allows-brain-independent-motor-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd943ac1-fad1-42e0-8452-b4bb1196f5fd Sat, 13 Apr 2024 14:58:00 -0400 Neural circuitry in the spinal cord allows brain-independent motor learning
